entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to by Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, who is in a duel with Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A character mentioned by Voldemort as having pulled strings to help Harry survive.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Objects that contain pieces of Voldemort's soul and are necessary for his immortality.

relationships.description: Harry and Voldemort are engaged in a duel, moving sideways in a perfect circle.
Voldemort mentions that Dumbledore helped Harry survive by pulling strings.
Voldemort is dependent on the Horcruxes for his immortality.
